summary: Modders Resource: Dunmeri Banners to match my Dunmeri Great House Robes clothing & armor mod
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=6][center]Dumeri Banners Modders Resource[/center][/size][/color][/b][size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87257-0-1507632809.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=3]I made these to go along with my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86740/?]Dunmeri Great House Robes[/url] clothing & armor mod.
These can be incorporated into any Dunmer-related mods: Homes, Followers, whatever you like!
DDS (diffuse) files only. Uses default vanilla normals (from Hi-Res DLC).
Demo ESP, use cc "coc aaDunmerBanners"
Free to use and/or improve upon (Photoshop files included under Miscellaneous section)
Please just give me credit and provide a link to this file.
I'd also really appreciate a message showing a link to your mod where using these!
Enjoy!

From the [url=https://www.imperial-library.info/category/tags/great-houses]Imperi[/url][url=https://www.imperial-library.info/category/tags/great-houses]al Library:[/url]

House Redoran: "A Redoran is a warrior whose duty is first to the Tribunal, second to House Redoran, and third to family and clan."
Banner says: [color=#cc0000]Tribunal House Family. REDORAN.[/color][color=#cc0000]
[/color]
House Indoril: "Justice knows no sleep: Indoril shall order, the Temple shall judge."
Banner says: [color=#f1c232]Jusitce always, Indoril orders, Temple judges. INDORIL.[/color]

House Hlaalu: "To trade fairly and freely is to honor the Three."
Banners says: [color=#ffff00]Trade fairly freely honor Three. HLAALU.[/color]

House Dres: "To spread culture and truth to the benighted: this is our commitment and burden."
Banners says: [color=#999999]Culture truth commitment burden. DRES.[/color]

House Telvanni: "The forceful expression of will gives true honor to the Ancestors."
Banner says: [color=#7f6000]Express will, honor Ancestors. TELVANNI.[/color]

[b][color=#00ff00]Credits:[/color][/b]
Google - fabric images
[url=https://www.imperial-library.info/category/tags/great-houses]Imperial Library[/url]
DaFont.com - Daedric font[/size]
author: Anduniel
